group_1.narration: blue_axe: youre definitely mvp of this quest mist@an absolute boss
blue_axe: seriously when do you even sleep?
Mist: heh heh heh... heroes never sleep lol

group_1.textRight: You appear to be having a lot of fun, Mitsune.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Kyubey. Thanks for the other day, lol.
My wish really came true.
My classmates and parents have stopped@talking about me, lmao.
Plus, after becoming a Magical Girl, I can stay up@all night without getting tired at all.

group_1.textRight: Personally, I would prefer that you keep an ample@supply of that valuable magic power in reserve.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Then, what would I use it for?

group_1.textRight: Your duty as a Magical Girl is to hunt Witches.
Don't you think it's about time you@go hunt some?

group_1.textLeft: ...I won't.

group_1.textRight: Why not? Magical Girls are supposed to...

group_1.textLeft: Magical Girls are supposed to hunt Witches, right?@That's why I won't hunt any.
I'm gonna ruin the image I have of Magical Girls@by being a lazy piece of trash, lmao.

group_1.textRight: It seems that you haven't fought any Witches@since then.

group_1.textLeft: ...Ugh, what is this...I don't have any strength...

group_1.textRight: Good grief, you're in a pitiful state.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey...
...what's wrong with my body?

group_1.textRight: You've exhausted too much of your magic.@Look at your Soul Gem.

group_1.textLeft: ...Soul Gem? This jewel?

group_1.textRight: The gleam of your Soul Gem represents the@current reserve of your power.

group_1.textLeft: Magic power...is only for casting magic, isn't it?
Why...would this happen...

group_1.textRight: Magic is also used to maintain the@bodies of Magical Girls.
Your Soul Gem is currently murky.
That means your Soul Gem is almost@depleted of magical power.
The condition of your body is a manifestation@of that.

group_1.textLeft: ...Then, what do I do?

group_1.textRight: The only solution is to defeat a Witch.

group_1.textLeft: ...What?

group_1.textRight: By defeating a Witch, you can obtain a@Grief Seed used to purify it.
There are no other methods of purifying@your Soul Gem.

group_1.textLeft: Then I have to defeat a Witch to cure this?

group_1.textRight: That's what I've told you.

group_1.textLeft: ...B-but...that's crazy! Because my wish is...
I can really...make any wish I want, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes, of course.
The only condition is that you accept your destiny of@hunting Witches.
Now, what do you wish for, Mitsune?

group_1.textLeft: ...My wish is already determined.
I'd rather stay the same...than suffer the pain@of trying to change.
So, my wish is...guaranteed shut-in status...@...for life!
...a "guarantee to be a shut-in for life"...

group_1.textRight: Your wish was certainly granted.
The reality is that every voice of criticism towards@your present situation has disappeared.

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case...

group_1.textRight: You can continue to be a shut-in without@fighting Witches.
Provided that you are willing to remain in@this condition, that is.

group_1.textLeft: ...This isn't what I asked for.

group_1.textRight: "The only condition is that you accept your destiny of@hunting Witches"...
That's what I told you.

group_1.textLeft: (Hunting Witches...)
(I don't know...if that's possible for me...)
